title: I Dew Care Buttery Vitamin C Lip Beauty Mask
description: Indulge your lips with this luxurious vitamin C lip mask. Formulated with rich buttery ingredients, it nourishes and hydrates while leaving your lips soft and supple.

title: I Dew Care Silicone Mask Brush
description: Make mask application a breeze with this silicone mask brush. Its flexible design ensures even and smooth application for a spa-like experience at home.

title: I Dew Care Cushy Crush Sugar Vitamin C Lip Scrub
description: Buff away dry, flaky lips with this sugar lip scrub. Enriched with vitamin C, it gently exfoliates while leaving your lips smooth and refreshed.

title: I Dew Care Peel Lit Exfoliating Vitamin C Treatment Pads
description: Revitalize your skin with these exfoliating treatment pads. Infused with vitamin C, they help to remove dead skin cells and promote a brighter complexion.

title: I Dew Care Glow Easy Vitamin C Lip Oil - Pomegranate
description: Nourish and hydrate your lips with this vitamin C lip oil. Formulated with pomegranate extract, it provides antioxidant protection while adding a natural shine.

title: I Dew Care Glow Easy Vitamin C Lip Oil - Raspberry
description: Treat your lips to this nourishing vitamin C lip oil. Infused with raspberry extract, it helps to soften and moisturize while enhancing your natural lip color.

title: I Dew Care Power Plug Firming Bakuchiol Night Cream
description: Rejuvenate your skin while you sleep with this firming night cream. Formulated with bakuchiol, it helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

title: I Dew Care Roll-On Face Oil with Tea Tree Leaf Oil
description: Pamper your skin with this roll-on face oil infused with tea tree leaf oil. Its convenient rollerball design makes it easy to apply and perfect for on-the-go use.

title: I Dew Care Berry Groovy Brightening Beauty Mask with Glycolic Acid
description: Achieve a radiant complexion with this brightening beauty mask. Enriched with glycolic acid, it helps to exfoliate and reveal smoother, more luminous skin.

title: I Dew Care Here's The Tea Tree Soothing Beauty Sheet Mask
description: Soothe and calm your skin with this tea tree-infused sheet mask. Its gentle formula helps to reduce redness and irritation for a clearer, more balanced complexion.
